Texto: 
cholecystectomy is preferred treatment
wall echo shadow (wes) sign on us.
calcified gallbladder wall/aorta, multiple renal cysts on ct.
porcelain gallbladder confirmed via ct
us
-----
1. gallbladder filled with stones
2. porcelain gallbladder
3. emphysematous cholecystitis
pt with history of gallstones and chronic abdominal pain.
